name: ImageNet Model Featurization
title: ImageNet Model Featurization
description: Image featurization using models pre-trained on ImageNet
author: Hythem Sidky (hythem.sidky@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Pre-trained ImageNet model to use for featurization

inputs.name: resolution
inputs.description: Resolution to which the input images are scaled

ui.title: Input collection
ui.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

ui.title: Model
ui.description: Pre-trained ImageNet model to use for featurization

ui.title: Image Resolution
ui.description: Resolution to which the input images are scaled
